publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2003 Stuart McMillan: Dr Janet Picket, Mount Everest Climb—That the Parliament wishes to congratulate Dr Janet Picket, a native of Inverclyde and student at Greenock Academy and Glasgow University, on her successful climb of Mount Everest; recognises the dangers and risks involved in Dr Picket’s climb; lauds her bravery in the ascent despite the risks, and commends Dr Picket for using the climb as a vehicle to raise £30,000 for a maternity ward to be built at her hospital in Cambridge.
S3M-2003 Dr Janet Picket, Mount Everest Climb (lodged on 28 May 2008) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2003 Stuart McMillan: Dr Janet Picket, Mount Everest Climb—That the Parliament wishes to congratulate Dr Janet Picket, a native of Inverclyde and student at Greenock Academy and Glasgow University, on her successful climb of Mount Everest; recognises the dangers and risks involved in Dr Picket’s climb; lauds her bravery in the ascent despite the risks, and commends Dr Picket for using the climb as a vehicle to raise £30,000 for a maternity ward to be built at her hospital in Cambridge. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
